p: Yarrow oil mitigated UC symptoms both macroscopically and histologically in addition to the associated inflammatory biomarkers. In addition to its ability to regulates immune cell infiltration and inflammatory cytokines secretion via regulation of signals including NF-κB and PPAR-γ pathways. Yarrow oil is emerging as a promising, safe, cheap, and effective drug for the effective therapeutic strategy for the IBD however further pharmaceutical formulations and clinical experiments are needed for validation.
